instruction: Analyze the performance of the MSCI ACWI IMI Innovation Index for the past five years by focusing on the 17 themes it targets.
output: Based on our analysis, we found that the improvement in thematic exposure for each combination of the MSCI ACWI IMI Innovation Index was consistent over the past five years. We also discovered that we did not need to make any dynamic changes to index weights to maintain exposure improvement. The improvement was mainly concentrated in themes such as disruptive technologies and genomics, among the 17 themes targeted by the index.
